I've ordered from Hanifaa Frozen Food twice now, and both times have been a great experience. The meat is of excellent quality, and the service is straightforward and prompt. What I really appreciate is the pricing‚Äîit's very economical, especially when buying in bulk for 2-3 weeks' worth of protein. Highly recommend them for anyone looking for good quality meat at reasonable prices!

Ordered fresh mutton and small ribs. The mutton was perfect and no fats. After cooking it was soft and totally love it. Will definitely order from them again.
